short_summary: Transition to organic farming at Alaksen National Wildlife Area
description: Implement and evaluate different methods for organic-regenerative farming at Alaksen National Wildlife Reserve in a way that also supports water and wildlife habitats.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Alaksen National Wildlife Area Transition to Organic Farming - Research, Trials, and Planning**

**Reference Number:** CB-693-55643352

**Solicitation Number:** 5000076341

**Publication Date:** March 18, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** April 12, 2024, 18:00:00

**Amendment Date:** April 12, 2024

**Expected Contract Start Date:** April 26, 2024

**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

**Procurement Category:** SRV (Service)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Trade Agreements:**

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Trade Agreements (French):**

* Accord sur les marchés publics de l'Organisation mondiale du commerce (AMP-OMC)
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Pérou (ALECP)
* Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Ukraine (ALECU)
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Honduras
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili (ALECC)
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Corée
* Accord de Partenariat transpacifique global et progressiste (PTPGP)
* Accord économique et commercial global (AECG) entre le Canada et l’Union européenne (UE)
* Accord de continuité commerciale Canada–Royaume-Uni (ACC Canada-Royaume-Uni)
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Panama
